data.title: Harris to Lean on Tight Team, Obama Staff in White House Run
data.meta_description: As Kamala Harris prepares to take on Donald Trump, her advisers as Joe Biden’s vice president provide a window into her style and priorities.
data.text:
Vice president, like Biden, has kept a tight circle of aides

Quick shift to nominee puts key staff assignments in play

As Kamala Harris prepares to take on Donald Trump , her advisers as Joe Biden ’s vice president provide a window into her style and priorities.

Two threads are emerging in the short time since launching her White House run: Many Harris aides have worked primarily or entirely for her, not Biden. And she’s said to be considering several veterans from the administration of Barack Obama , who on Friday endorsed her, as well as some Biden-era heavyweights.
